workshoptitle: Migrate MySQL to Oracle ADB using Oracle SQL Developer

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction about this workshop and objectives.

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Prerequisites Setup - Create ADB for Target (Optional Lab)
tutorials.description: This lab will help you create Oracle ADB (ADW/ATP) instance for target purpose, if you don't already have that

tutorials.title: Prerequisites Setup - Create Windows VM to run Oracle SQL Developer (Optional Lab)
tutorials.description: This lab will help you create OCI Windows instance to install later SQL Developer. If you plan to run SQL Developer from your laptop or any desktop, you can skip this lab

tutorials.title: Migration Workshop Labs
tutorials.description: All tasks to complete this workshop

tutorials.title: Connect Securely Using SQL Developer with a Connection Wallet
tutorials.description: Refer to this lab to make connection in SQL Developer for ADB instance

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
